title: Mastery 7 no more boxes?
body:
I continue to get S- S and S+ on my Mastery 7 Shaco throughout the day but only keys never any chests, like ever, its been months since I got one on Shaco, is this intentional that once Mastery 7 your stuck with just getting keys for boxes you cant open?

IGN 0kamiyasha

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you can only earn a chest while playing a champion **once per season**. You'll want to expand your champion pool if you want to maximize the number of chests and keys you earn through the loot system.

If you have any other questions, please let me know.
It is intentional as you can only earn one chest per champion each season.
